timeline.message:
Fixes #471

Adds support for `@Broadcast` on `Emitter` to broadcast to all subscribers

timeline.bodyText:
Should we make all the fields final and public?
That would avoid getters, and be "like a record".
timeline.author: cescoffier

replies.bodyText:
It would mean the constructor setting values to null based on what's based in vs setting the default on the field itself.
Is that ok?
replies.author: kenfinnigan

replies.bodyText:
The constructor would have to set the fields to null / false/ -1.
I don't have a strong opinion about it, I'm not sure it simplifies much.
replies.author: cescoffier

replies.bodyText: So... Leave or change? I don't mind
replies.author: kenfinnigan

replies.bodyText: I will include the change for now
replies.author: kenfinnigan

timeline.bodyText: Should we define an Overflow literal?
timeline.author: cescoffier

replies.bodyText: It's in a test, so not sure if it's that important
replies.author: kenfinnigan

replies.bodyText: Right, we can keep it like this.
replies.author: cescoffier

timeline.message: Add missing documentation and minor update based on feedback
